data.name: AccountActivationBadTokenError
data.value: The token for your account activation is invalid.

data.name: AccountMessageCompanyExists
data.value: The company name is already registered

data.name: AccountMessageEmailExists
data.value: The email address is already registered

data.name: AccountNewMailBody
data.value: An Ecocyclus account has been generated for you. This is your login information:[n][n]User: [user][n]Password: [password].[n][n]You can proceed to Ecocyclus and enter the platform at: [<a]http://gsi.siteimpacts.com[a>]http://gsi.siteimpacts.com[/a].

data.name: AccountNewMailSubject
data.value: Ecocyclus:: New Account

data.name: AccountRecoveryMailBody
data.value: Your recovery process has been started.[n][n]Please reset your account password by following this link: [<a]http://ecocyclus.com/Communities/Registration/PasswordReset.aspx?token=[token]&language=[language][a>]>reset password[/a][n][n]

data.name: AccountRecoveryMailSubject
data.value: Ecocyclus :: Recovery Process

data.name: AccountRegistrationAdministrationMailBody
data.value: The company [company] registration process has been started.[n][n]

data.name: AccountRegistrationMailBody
data.value: Your registration process has been started.[n][n]Please activate your account by following this link: [<a]http://ecocyclus.com/Communities/Registration/RegistrationVerifier.aspx?token=[token]&language=[language][a>]activate account[/a][n][n]

data.name: AccountRegistrationMailSubject
data.value: Ecocyclus :: Registration Process

data.name: AccountVerificationAdministrationMailBody
data.value: The company [company] has verified the account information.[n][n]

data.name: AuthenticationError
data.value: The authentication process has failed.

data.name: ContactTitle
data.value: Ecocyclus :: Contact Request

data.name: DataLoadInvalidDistance
data.value: The distance are invalid. They must be greater than 0.

data.name: DataLoadInvalidPeriod
data.value: The dates are invalid. Start date must be greater than end date.

data.name: DatesInvalid
data.value: The dates ranges provided are invalid

data.name: DuplicatedMeter
data.value: The meter cannot be saved because its identification already exists.

data.name: DuplicatedRecord
data.value: The information cannot be saved because a unique value already exist.

data.name: DuplicatedSite
data.value: The facility cannot be saved because its name or number already exists.

data.name: DuplicatedUnit
data.value: The unit cannot be saved because its name already exists.

data.name: ErrorCannotChangeInitialDate
data.value: You cannot change the initial date because the meter already has values.

data.name: ErrorCannotChangeMagnitude
data.value: You cannot change magnitude because the meter already has values with previous magnitude.

data.name: ErrorCannotDeleteExistingRelationship
data.value: Related data exist which prevent removal of this information

data.name: ErrorCannotDeleteLastUser
data.value: The last user cannot be removed.

data.name: ErrorCannotUseDifferentMagnitudes
data.value: Different magnitudes cannot be used for the same data type in the serie.

data.name: LoadDateViolation
data.value: The dates for loading data have to be lesser or equal than today.

data.name: MailFooter
data.value: [n][n]This is an Ecocyclus platform notification message. Please do not respond this email.

data.name: MeterHasValue
data.value: The meter cannot modify the measurement unit because it already has values.

data.name: NextDateInvalid
data.value: The first date provided does not match the next available date for data load.

data.name: NotificationSiteMeterNoticeMessage
data.value: The meter [meter] of site [site] needs to be loaded.

data.name: NotificationSiteMeterNoticeTitle
data.value: Meter Load Notice

data.name: NotificationSiteMeterOverdueMessage
data.value: The load frequency of meter [meter] of facility [site] is overdue.

data.name: NotificationSiteMeterOverdueTitle
data.value: Meter Load Overdue

data.name: NotificationSiteTargetSurpassedMessage
data.value: The targets for [protocol] of the facility [site] on [month] of [year] have been surpassed by [amount] [units].

data.name: NotificationSiteTargetSurpassedTitle
data.value: Facility Targets Surpassed

data.name: PaymentAdministrationMailBody
data.value: The company [company] has made a payment of [amount] for the period [period] for the facility [site].[n] The transaction id is: [transaction].[n][n]

data.name: PaymentAdministrationMailSubject
data.value: Ecocyclus :: New Payment

data.name: PaymentConfirmedAdministrationMailBody
data.value: The company [company] has confirmed the payment for transaction id [transaction].[n][n]

data.name: PaymentConfirmedAdministrationMailSubject
data.value: Ecocyclus :: Payment Confirmed

data.name: PaymentErrorDifferentAmount
data.value: The total amount informed for the payment does not match with the correct payment scale.

data.name: PaymentErrorWrongDates
data.value: The dates for the new load period don´t have correct values!. The dates must be a valid time range and must match with the beginning or the end of the current load period.

data.name: PermissionDenied
data.value: You do not have permissions to perform this action. Please contact your platform administrators.

data.name: PermissionsCannotChangeManager
data.value: You cannot change access permissions for a company manager

data.name: PhysicalMeterInvalidValue
data.value: Reading values of a physical meter have to be equal or greater than the previous one.

data.name: SiteClosed
data.value: You cannot perform this action because the facility is closed.

data.name: SiteLoadDateViolation
data.value: The dates for loading data must be valid for the time range enabled for the facility.

data.name: SiteStartDateViolation
data.value: The dates for loading data have to be greater or equal than the facility start date.
